sections.title: Retention plans that keep orthodontic results stable
sections.body: Dental retainers hold teeth in their new positions after orthodontic treatment. We offer removable Essix retainers, fixed bonded retainers, and 3D printed tooth-coloured fixed retainers with reviews to keep them secure.
bullets: Custom-made retention after braces or aligners
Removable and fixed options explained clearly
Scheduled reviews to keep retainers comfortable

sections.title: Why retainers matter
sections.body: Teeth can drift without support after orthodontics. We plan retention early, balancing appearance, hygiene access, and durability so you keep your smile aligned.
bullets: Retention discussed before active treatment finishes
Options matched to your bite, enamel, and lifestyle
Clear wear schedules and maintenance guidance

sections.title: Choose the retainer that suits your smile
items: Removable Essix retainers for discreet overnight wear
Fixed bonded retainers secured behind teeth for continuous support
3D printed tooth-coloured fixed retainers designed for stability and a low profile

sections.title: Plan, fit, and monitor your retention
items: Review tooth movement and discuss the right mix of retainers
Take impressions or scans for precise fabrication
Fit removable or fixed retainers with bite checks
Teach cleaning and wear routines tailored to your appliances
Regular reviews to check bonding, fit, and any tooth movement
sections.strapline: We keep digital records where possible so replacements are straightforward if needed.

sections.title: Protect your retainers and your result
items: Clean removable retainers daily with non-abrasive products
Avoid hot water to prevent warping
Check bonded retainers for loose sections and contact us promptly
Plan replacements or backups before retainers wear or are lost
Bring retainers to orthodontic reviews for monitoring

faqs.question: Will I need retainers after orthodontics?
faqs.answer: Yes. Retainers are essential to maintain alignment. We guide you on how long to wear them and schedule reviews to keep them secure.

faqs.question: Can I choose between removable and fixed?
faqs.answer: We explain the pros and cons of Essix removable retainers, bonded retainers, and 3D printed tooth-coloured fixed options so you can decide with clinical guidance.

faqs.question: What if a retainer breaks or goes missing?
faqs.answer: Contact us promptly. We can repair bonded retainers when suitable or arrange swift replacements using your records to prevent unwanted tooth movement.

sections.title: Plan retention that lasts
sections.body: Book a visit to finalise your retention plan and choose between removable, bonded, and 3D printed tooth-coloured retainers with clear care guidance.
